description:
Suspects having attained the age of criminal responsibility

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
24911 Police crime statistics

Definition:
A suspect is anyone who, according to police investigation,
is sufficiently suspected to have committed a criminal
offence.
The age of criminal responsibility means that the relevant
person was 14 years old or over when the offence was
committed (Section 19 of the Criminal Code).
